analysis.description: RING.isContract (/unique_chucks/7/0x86e56f3c89a14528858e58b3de48c074538baf2c.sol#532-544) is declared view but contains assembly code

RING.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x86e56f3c89a14528858e58b3de48c074538baf2c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
